item.title: Does Owning a Business Push People to the Political Right? A Stanford Study Says Yes
item.description: New research confirms what you probably suspected — small business owners lean Republican — but offers interesting new detail about why.

item.title: Science Says You Can Tell in 5 Minutes if Someone Isn’t Nearly as Smart as They Think: the ‘Cynical Genius Illusion’
item.description: While skeptical, cynical people seem intelligent… science says they’re not.
